page.title: 12Dialect from Borrowdale.
page.content: Yance on a time ther was a widda' body lived in a laal hoose on Borradale Road,aboot Boow Laithe.She hed nobbut hed yah lad,Jack,an' a gay targer he was.He didn't deau eny wark an' he hedn't plenty av stamps on his card ta git t'dole.As time went on tha' gat poorer an' poorer,till t'widda body hed ta sell t'coo. Once upon a time there was a widow who lived in a little house on Borrowdale Road, near Boow Laithe.She only had one son, Jack,and a very lazy boy he was.He didn't do any work and he hadn't many stamps on his card to entitle him to the dole.As time went on they got poorer and poorer, until the widow had to sell the cow.
